texts.info: We could not find any Records.
texts.query: It seems like you have some Filters active or visited a Page without any Records.

info.hangar: You can add Ships to your Hangar by clicking on the bookmark icon in the top right corner of a Ship or by using the Plus Button in the bottom right corner.
info.extension: Additionally you can import your Hangar from the RSI Website via the Fleetyards Sync Browser extension.
info.wishlist: You can add Ships to your Wishlist by clicking on the bookmark icon in the top right corner of a Ship.
